    • saveAlltoCSV

      public static boolean saveAlltoCSV()
      Saves the current state of the diagnosis records repository to a CSV file.
      Returns:
      true if the save operation is successful

    • saveDiagnosisRecordsToCSV

      public static void saveDiagnosisRecordsToCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,ArrayList<Diagnosis>> patientDiagnosisRecords)
      Saves the provided diagnosis records to the specified CSV file.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the file to save records to
      patientDiagnosisRecords - the records to save

    • loadDiagnosisRecordsFromCSV

      public static void loadDiagnosisRecordsFromCSV(String fileName, HashMap<String,ArrayList<Diagnosis>> patientDiagnosisRecords)
      Loads diagnosis records from the specified CSV file, creating an empty file if it does not exist. Records are added to the provided HashMap.
      Parameters:
      fileName - the name of the CSV file to load from
      patientDiagnosisRecords - the HashMap to store the loaded records

    • addDiagnosis

      public static void addDiagnosis(String patientID, Diagnosis diagnosis)
      Adds a diagnosis record to the HashMap for the specified patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the patient ID associated with the diagnosis
      diagnosis - the Diagnosis to add

    • isRepoLoaded

      public static boolean isRepoLoaded()
      Checks if the repository has been loaded.
      Returns:
      true if the repository is loaded; false otherwise

    • setRepoLoaded

      public static void setRepoLoaded(boolean isRepoLoaded)
      Sets the repository load status.
      Parameters:
      isRepoLoaded - true to set the repository as loaded, false otherwise

    • getDiagnosesByPatientID

      public static ArrayList<Diagnosis> getDiagnosesByPatientID(String patientID)
      Retrieves a list of diagnoses for the specified patient ID.
      Parameters:
      patientID - the patient ID for which diagnoses are requested
      Returns:
      an ArrayList of Diagnosis objects for the specified patient ID
